hero.title: Master DSA Patterns in 30 Days with Your Personal AI Mentor
hero.description: Stop grinding LeetCode blindly. Learn the 8 essential algorithm patterns that unlock 90% of coding interviews. Guided by AI that teaches like the best tutors at $200/hour.

speed.title: Socratic Learning
speed.description: AI asks the right questions to guide you to insights. Build deep understanding, not memorization.

security.title: Pattern-First Approach
security.description: Master 8 essential patterns that solve 90% of interview problems. Quality over quantity.

ai.title: 24/7 AI Mentor

socialProof.title: Used by Engineers at Top Companies

featureHighlights.title: Everything You Need to Master DSA

cta.title: Ready to Master DSA Patterns?
cta.description: Join 2,000+ developers who've transformed their careers with pattern mastery.

about.title: Why DSA Pattern Master?
about.description1: was built by engineers who've been on both sides of the interview table. We know that pattern recognition is the key to algorithmic thinking.
about.description2: Instead of memorizing hundreds of solutions, our AI mentor teaches you to recognize the 8 fundamental patterns that unlock 90% of coding problems.
about.description3: Whether you're a bootcamp grad or seasoned developer, our Socratic approach builds the deep understanding that gets you hired at top tech companies.

pricing.title: Get World-Class DSA Mentorship
pricing.subtitle: For less than one tutoring session. 14-day money-back guarantee.

starter.name: Monthly
starter.description: Perfect for interview preparation and skill building
starter.features: All 8 DSA patterns,Unlimited AI interactions,Progress tracking,Interview simulation,24/7 learning support

pro.name: Annual
pro.features: Everything in Monthly,Priority AI response,Advanced progress insights,Early access to new patterns,Annual pricing lock

enterprise.name: Free Preview
enterprise.description: Try one complete pattern before you commit
enterprise.features: Two Pointer pattern,Full AI mentoring,Pattern mastery assessment,No credit card required

i18n.title: Date & Time Formatting with TimeZone
i18n.description: This page demonstrates the internationalization features including time zone support.
i18n.footer: All date and time formatting in this application is powered by next-intl and configured to use the {timezone} timezone by default. This ensures consistency across the application and prevents markup mismatches caused by environment differences.
